usage: monitor_cache.py [-h] [--continuous] [--interval INTERVAL]
                        [--duration DURATION] [--graphs] [--export-csv]
                        [--csv-path CSV_PATH] [--silent]

Advanced Cache Monitoring Tool

options:
  -h, --help           show this help message and exit
  --continuous         Run continuous monitoring
  --interval INTERVAL  Monitoring interval in seconds (default: 60)
  --duration DURATION  Duration of continuous monitoring in seconds
  --graphs             Generate performance graphs
  --export-csv         Export metrics to CSV
  --csv-path CSV_PATH  Path for CSV export
  --silent             Run without printing reports
